subject: Indian Polity
topic: E-Governance aur Good Governance ki Avdharna
question_en: What is the concept of e-governance in the context of good governance?
question_hi: बीकानेर के संबंधित सफल प्रभावों का अध्ययन
explanation_en:
Electronic governance, also known as cyber governance, refers to the application of information technology for the efficient and transparent administration of government services. It focuses on using technology to improve the quality of governance and provide better services to the citizens.
